posts.post_content:
Hey yall,

I have this T206 Fred Beck SGC 1.5.  I was wondering if you guys can take a look at it and see if yall can give me a rough est. of about how much it is worth.  Thank you :)

[IMG]http://i.ebayimg.com/images/g/R0kAAOSwPK1ZVt6-/s-l1600.jpg[/IMG]
[IMG]http://i.ebayimg.com/images/g/MT0AAOSw1BlZVt7C/s-l1600.jpg[/IMG]

Yea he's right, its only around $20. 
Fred Beck was not a star player.

Seller is banned. Sorry guys. I got a tip and called him after I checked his 80% ebay feedback rating (only 5-10 feedback total). He said he just sells stuff when I asked him about the issue on the bay...He gives good deals because it's not graded stuff. THe phone call was hilarious actually....

 He is/was also selling a bad autograph on the board too.

It's good to know someone is keeping an eye on this sort of thing. I've probably done 30 or so transactions over the last year on BST and, knock on wood, have never had anything less than a very positive result. I thinking weeding out problems before they start is probably a big reason for that. Thanks for all you do Leon.

[quote name="Leon" post=1681946]Seller is banned. Sorry guys. I got a tip and called him after I checked his 80% ebay feedback rating (only 5-10 feedback total). He said he just sells stuff when I asked him about the issue on the bay...He gives good deals because it's not graded stuff. THe phone call was hilarious actually....

 He is/was also selling a bad autograph on the board too.[/QUOTE]

All because he misspelled yall.:D
All of his threads he started except this one are now locked.  He was a prolific bozo....

[quote name="frankbmd" post=1682020]All because he misspelled yall.:D[/QUOTE]

I'm of the minority who feel the proper spelling is ya'll, as a conjugate of "ya" and "all", as in... What are ya all doing?  Frank, is this ban-worthy?  :)
